posts.post_title: Remaining cards from REA lot 439 new pics
posts.post_content:

Robert Ewing $100
David Shean $95
George Schlei $90
Frank Corridon $90
Russell Blackburne nice card $90
James Austin. Nice card $90
John Bates surface crease $50

Scans are posted below.  PM me or email me at [url]cubkmac32@aol.com[/url].  Paypal f/f for payment please.  Prices are listed next to cards but feel free to make reasonable offers and deals.  Prices include shipping

Ken
